com.pstmetro.metro.node

Class MetroNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inlustra.gui.elements.CanvasElement
      • com.inlustra.gui.elements.InnerElement
        • com.inlustra.gui.elements.centered.CenteredInnerElement
          • com.pstmetro.metro.node.MetroNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.inlustra.gui.mouse.CanvasMouseListener, Comparable<com.inlustra.gui.elements.CanvasElement>

    public class MetroNode
extends com.inlustra.gui.elements.centered.CenteredInnerElement
implements com.inlustra.gui.mouse.CanvasMouseListener
    Used as nodes in the Dijkstras algorithm these contain only the code required to visually represent them.

         int textRotation,
         int x,
         int y,
         int width,
         int height)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the MetroNode
        textRotation - initial rotation of the Text
        x - X location of the absolutely positioned container.
        y - Y location of the absolutely positioned container.
        width - Width of the absolutely positioned container.
        height - Height of the absolutely positioned container.

      • getName

        the name of the station

      • setName

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object
        Returns:
        This ensures that a single metroNode of this name exists by multiplying thehashcode of the String name by a random prime number, this gives the metroNode an ID or hashCode associated with the name but always the same.
